SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_ADDCHILD
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to add a child to a sponsor interaction extension
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_ADDCHILD ( @interactionID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Interaction ID to add the child to. @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Child ID of the child to add @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier = null -- Used to track who added the interaction, retrieved with USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT if null ) as begin begin try -- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
if @interactionID is null raiserror('Interaction ID cannot be null',16,1);
declare @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST insert @childIDList select @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID
exec dbo.USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_ADDCHILDREN @interactionID = @interactionID, @childIDList = @childIDList, @changeAgentID = @changeAgentID
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0 end
